kodkod.engine.fol2sat

Interface RecordFilter


  • public interface RecordFilter
    A filter for TranslationRecords, based on the value of a record's node and literal fields.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static RecordFilter ALL
      A record filter that accepts all records.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accept(Node node, Formula translated, int literal, Map<Variable,TupleSet> env)
      Returns true if the records with the given node, formula derived from the node, literal, and environment should be returned by iterators produced by the TranslationLog.replay() method.

    • Field Detail

      • ALL

        static final RecordFilter ALL
        A record filter that accepts all records.

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        boolean accept(Node node,
             Formula translated,
             int literal,
             Map<Variable,TupleSet> env)
        Returns true if the records with the given node, formula derived from the node, literal, and environment should be returned by iterators produced by the TranslationLog.replay() method.
        Returns:
        true if the records with the given node, formula derived from the node, literal, and environment should be returned by iterators produced by TranslationLog.replay().
